author: andyc
msg: Fixed bug that caused character events not to be propagated to
the registered ContentHandler/DocumentHandler. This was caused
(most likely) from the refactoring to enable various parser
configurations easier to construct and re-use.

author: lehors
msg: split attribute value normalization into 2 phases, so that the
part which requires Grammar knowledge is in the validator.
Also cleaned up the validator a little. Much more is needed though :-(
Changed the document scanner to set attributes as specified.

author: lehors
msg: fixed startDocument to match the new interface

author: neilg
msg: fixes for the feedback section of our docs to take Bugzilla and the bifurcation of our mailing lists into account.
